trans-unit.source: Provides panels on each side of the form and a central panel that can hold one or more controls.
trans-unit.target: Proporciona los paneles de cada lado del formulario y un panel central que pueden contener uno o más controles.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> is similar to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> es similar a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>.

trans-unit.source: It uses four docked side panels (instances of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>) and one central panel (an instance of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel>) to create a typical arrangement.
trans-unit.target: Utiliza cuatro paneles laterales acoplados (instancias de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>) y un panel central (una instancia de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel>) para crear una configuración típica.

trans-unit.source: You cannot remove the side panels, but you can hide them by setting their respective <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.TopToolStripPanelVisible%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.BottomToolStripPanelVisible%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.LeftToolStripPanelVisible%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.RightToolStripPanelVisible%2A> properties to `false`.
trans-unit.target: No se puede quitar los paneles laterales, pero puede ocultarlos estableciendo sus respectivas <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.TopToolStripPanelVisible%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.BottomToolStripPanelVisible%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.LeftToolStripPanelVisible%2A>, y <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.RightToolStripPanelVisible%2A> propiedades para `false`.

trans-unit.source: By default, each of these properties is `true` at design time.
trans-unit.target: De forma predeterminada, cada una de estas propiedades es `true` en tiempo de diseño.

trans-unit.source: Also at design time, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> appears with its top panel already expanded.
trans-unit.target: También en tiempo de diseño, el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> aparece con su panel superior está expandido.

trans-unit.source: You can neither remove nor hide the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel>.
trans-unit.target: No puede quitar ni ocultar el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel>.

trans-unit.source: You can arrange one or more <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> controls in the side panels, and you can use the central panel for other controls.
trans-unit.target: Puede organizar uno o varios <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> controles en los paneles laterales y pueden utilizar el panel central para otros controles.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel> also provides a way to get renderer support into the body of your form for a consistent appearance.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel> también proporciona una manera para obtener compatibilidad con el representador en el cuerpo del formulario para una apariencia coherente.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> does not support Multiple Document Interface (MDI) applications.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> no se admiten las aplicaciones de interfaz de múltiples documentos (MDI).

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> for MDI applications.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> para las aplicaciones MDI.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates adding a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> to a Windows Forms, adding items to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, and adding the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.TopToolStripPanel%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer>.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo de código siguiente se muestra cómo agregar un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> y un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> a Windows Forms, agregar elementos a la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>y agregando el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> a la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.TopToolStripPanel%2A> de la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the bottom panel of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el panel inferior del objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" /> representing the bottom panel of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" />.
trans-unit.target: Un <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" /> que representa el panel inferior de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" />.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.BottomToolStripPanel%2A> property to add <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> controls or move them from another <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>.
trans-unit.target: Use la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.BottomToolStripPanel%2A> propiedad que se va a agregar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> controla o moverlos desde otro <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the bottom panel of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" /> is visible.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece un valor que indica si está visible el panel inferior del control <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the bottom panel of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" /> is visible; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> si está visible el panel inferior del control <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" />; de lo contrario, es <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: El valor predeterminado es <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.BottomToolStripPanelVisible%2A> property to `false` to use a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> without a bottom panel.
trans-unit.target: Establecer el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.BottomToolStripPanelVisible%2A> propiedad `false` para usar un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> sin un panel inferior.

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: Esta propiedad no es relevante para esta clase.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the control causes validation; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Es <see langword="true" /> si el control origina la validación; de lo contrario, es <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: Esta propiedad no es relevante para esta clase.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.CausesValidation" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Se produce cuando cambia el valor de la propiedad <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.CausesValidation" />.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información sobre el control de eventos, vea [controlar y provocar eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: Gets the center panel of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el panel central del objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel" /> representing the center panel of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" />.
trans-unit.target: Un objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel" /> que representa el panel central del control <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" />.

trans-unit.source: You can use the top, bottom, left, and right panels of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> to hold <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> controls.
trans-unit.target: Puede usar la parte superior, inferior, izquierdo y derecho paneles de la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> para contener <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> controles.

trans-unit.source: Controls other than <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> are automatically added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel>.
trans-unit.target: Controla distintos de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> se agregan automáticamente a la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the left panel of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el panel izquierdo del objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" /> representing the left panel of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" />.
trans-unit.target: Un <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" /> que representa el panel izquierdo de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" />.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.LeftToolStripPanel%2A> property to add <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> controls or move them from another <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>.
trans-unit.target: Use la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.LeftToolStripPanel%2A> propiedad que se va a agregar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> controla o moverlos desde otro <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the left panel of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" /> is visible.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece un valor que indica si está visible el panel izquierdo del control <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the left panel of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" /> is visible; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> si está visible el panel izquierdo del control <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" />; de lo contrario, es <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: El valor predeterminado es <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.LeftToolStripPanelVisible%2A> property to `false` to use a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> without a left panel.
trans-unit.target: Establecer el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.LeftToolStripPanelVisible%2A> propiedad `false` para usar un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> sin un panel de la izquierda.

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Datos del evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeftChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Genera el evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeftChanged" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> que contiene los datos del evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SizeChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Genera el evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SizeChanged" />.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Cuando se genera un evento, se invoca el controlador de eventos a través de un delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información, consulte [controlar y provocar eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.OnSizeChanged%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: El método <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.OnSizeChanged%2A> también permite que las clases derivadas controlen el evento sin adjuntar ningún delegado.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Ésta es la técnica preferida para controlar el evento en una clase derivada.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.OnSizeChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.OnSizeChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: Al reemplazar <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.OnSizeChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> en una clase derivada, asegúrese de llamar al método <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.OnSizeChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> de la clase base para que los delegados registrados reciban el evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets the right panel of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el panel derecho del objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" />.

trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece un valor que indica si está visible el panel derecho del control <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" />.

trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> si está visible el panel derecho del control <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" />; de lo contrario, es <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece un valor que indica si está visible el panel superior del control <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" />.

trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> si está visible el panel superior del control <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" />; de lo contrario, es <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
